dialogue.text: Hope you enjoy this little demo of Friday Night Funkin B-Sides ReWritten.
Unfortunately the only week you can play is Week 3 at the moment, but the others will be done in due time.
Also when the full mod gets released this message will be removed.
But before anyone asks, no I'm not the original creator of the B-Sides mod and I don't take credit for the original creators.
Hey, uh, how much longer am I going to have to wait before our mod gets released.
Don't worry about it, we'll be finished soon enough.
Alright, now have fun with this mod
